text: vony chekayutʹ do vsʹoho (prorotstvo) vykonuyutʹsya? Denʹ takyy fulfillment prybuvaye proyty, tsey khto disregarded tse ranishe skazhe, kur'yery nashoho Lorda prynesly pravdu. Chy ye budʹ-yaki poserednyky intercede vid nashoho imeni? Chy ne mohly b vy poslaty nam nazad, tak shcho my minyayemo nashu povedinku, ta krashche pratsi nizh yaki my?" Vony zahubyly yikhni dushi, ta yikhni volodiyutʹ novovvedennyamy vyklykaly yikhnyu pohybelʹ
